metadata.name: HostEX
metadata.description:
This modds adds 4 new Host types that acts similar to Met variations from Mega Man game series. How they work you can see on gifs (they can a little lag). All the new variations can replace original Host with ~33%.
Thanks to:
Wonsacz - for helping with Spinning Host sprite RendersDude - for making most of the spritesheets Pixel_Devil - for some Metal footage You - for downloading this mod
